reviews.review: Jedva čekam Informatiku da igramo CS.

Il gioco più bello che Valve abbia mai creato !

Na de file conversies van steam, mis je een executable file en kan je counter strike niet meer starten.
Wil je dit spel echt spelen, koop dan de cd in de winkel.
Alle deinstalleren en of installeren en valideren van je files helpen niet, steam als admin opstarten helpt niet.
Echt alles deinstalleren en opnieuw installeren helpt niet.

Weggegooid geld?
OH! The classic Counter-Strike... the first and best FPS I've played. It just brings sooo many memories playing with friends, so many laughs, etc.. If you've never played CS, please, just quit life!

Não tem nem o que falar, Counter-Strike 1.6 é o jogo FPS que abriu as portas para os outros. Um jogo muito bom, onde quase todos já jogaram (ao menos na lan-house) e quem não possuia ia para as lan-houses com os amigos jogar, onde dava lucro aos donos das lan-house xD. Até hoje é um jogo muito jogado! Não tem nem o que falar xD.
no je to taká na p*** hra v GRAFIKE ale čo cheťe na rok 2000, na začiatok 21 storočia je ta 3D grafika super :DDD

Old but gold!:)
I like it.
This reboot of the series fell flat just go back to CS:GO
I'm playing in this game since 2000! (CS Beta 7.1) It's my 1st favorite game!

El gran clásico del multijugador vuelve a la carga renovado y con nuevas fuerzas. El título con el que muchos tuvieron su bautismo de fuego en el juego online se presenta en una nueva versión, dispuesto a demostrar que la validez de su forma es incombustible.

I have some problems with this cs I have added many servers to my favourites but none of them are coming in "Find Servers" tab + my connection is working fine. My humble request please fix this issue.

There's nothing about Counter-Strike 1.6 that hasn't be said already, the game will always remain flawless in many gamers eyes throughout the world.
Tactiacl shooter at its finest, Cs 1.6 offers not only perfectly balanced matches and good maps but intense sneaking, real quick scoping, amazing weaponry, strategies and SO much more!
It is the easiest game to just pick up and play, and it would totaly fit in "Things any human beings should try atleast once." list.

Легендарный классический "Counter Strike" многим известный под названием "1.6" все еще актуален. Огромное спасибо Valve за оптимизацию под новые ОС и портирование на Mac/Linux. Однозначно рекомендуется олдфагам.
